changeSet.author: dchettupuzha
changeSet.sql: create table if not exists `prodlims`.`insuranceproviderdetail` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `insuranceprovider_name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `insuranceprovider_states` VARCHAR(255) NULL, `validfromdate` DATE NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: dchettupuzha
dchettupuzha
dchettupuzha
changeSet.comment: Update United Health Care start date
changeSet.sql: update insuranceproviderdetail set validfromdate = '2017-01-01' where id = 4 and validfromdate = '2016-07-01';
